channel.title: Combat help
channel.description: Can anyone tell me how... or link me to a tutorial for the problem I have.. When you change weapons.. for Example: Dragon claw spec to a chaotic maul... Or dds to ags... the special hits like the next weapon im weilding? Like claws hitting 500 500 500 500 because of the chaotic maul switch.. How do I fix this? No replies??????
